entry.title: lab01
entry.content: In this lab I created an online resume using the html and css skills learned in class. We hadn't learned about external css so the css is created and implemented solely for lab02.

entry.title: lab2
entry.content: In this lab I created an online resume using the html and css skills learned in class. We hadn't learned about external css so the css is created and implemented solely for lab02.

entry.title: lab03
entry.content: During this lab, I created the entirety of this portfolio. From just a few folders on this repository, I expanded this site to be extensible for the rest of the semester. I used used both html and external css to describe and style my site.

entry.title: lab04
entry.content: In this lab, we created both RSS and ATOM xml files to contain data about the past labs we have done
